item.description:
The Fatherhood Coalition State Meeting

The Fatherhood Coalition will hold a statewide meeting Saturday, May 30, 2:00-4:30 p.m. at the Westborough Public Library. On the agenda will be Coalition support of a Fathers' Day event, our cable TV program called "The Fathers' Corner", candidate support and chapter activities & developments. For more information, contact Joe Ureneck at 1-857-350-0575, or via e-mail at jureneck@comcast.net.

Directions to library: http://www.westboroug...

***********************************************************************************
Sign Making

There will also be a sign making party Saturday, May 30, starting at 10:00 a.m. in Westborough. Bar-B-Que & pool party to follow after creation of no less than 50 signs. We did 800 signs in the first wave and would like to do another 800 plus. Our statewide meeting just 10 minutes away.., same day (see note above). After the meeting, please return, poolside, for burgers & chicken. We ask that you bring a side dish or dessert, & BYOB. For more info and to RSVP, contact Bob Norton at 1-617-571-7591, or via e-mail at bob@clevelenterprises.com.

group.name: Greater Boston Chapter of The Fatherhood Coalition

item.name: CPF State Meeting and Sign Making
